title: Why no one mentions how broken Urgot is?
body: I mean cmon we need a break from Jayce, Vayne and Lee threads!

replies.body: Yup, I've 1v1 a Draven and vayne with him before

I just casually went against a {{champion:119}} {{champion:412}} v {{champion:6}}  botlane (support internet was messing up) and ended up getting fed, though due to jungle having to engage for me.
ty {{champion:48}}
He has the advantage of surprise, similar to galio and rumble. Nobody plays them, so nobody knows how to react to them, and they are underestimated.
Why Urgod? Why not Fiddlesticks? UH? DO YOU PERHAPS HATE URGOD?!?! Kappa.
Cause not many people know how to play him right. I love the ugly bastard..
